content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and transport belt (position (-16.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and transport belt (position (-15.5, -51.5))
### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) and burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) connected by a belt group
### Inserter System at position(-13.5, -50.5)
Consists of a burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) and burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) connected by a transport belt
### Chest at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of a wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) and a burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to insert items into a non-existent entity
-  Ensure that the entity you are trying to insert items into exists and is within range
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
-  Make sure the inserter has a valid source of items to pick up
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt
### Errors when burner mining drill is out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel the burner mining drill when it runs out of fuel
### Errors when output is blocked by item on the ground
-  Ensure that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output of the burner mining drill

### NAMESPACE
*   `insert_item`: a function that inserts items into an entity
    *   Failure modes: entity does not exist, entity is out of range, entity cannot accept the item
    *   Success modes: item is successfully inserted into the entity
*   `get_entities`: a function that retrieves entities on the map
    *   Failure modes: no entities found, entities are not accessible
    *   Success modes: entities are successfully retrieved
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter`: a burner inserter entity
    *   `burner_mining_drill`: a burner mining drill entity
    *   `furnace`: a stone furnace entity
    *   `chest`: a wooden chest entity
    *   `transport_belt`: a transport belt entity
    *   `iron_ore`: the item being mined
    *   `iron_plate`: the item being smelted
    *   `coal`: the fuel being used by the burner mining drill and inserter
